title: Kristoffer Jelbring: API页面重新上线
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-4-14 17:15 编辑 



@KrisJelbring
Finally http://api.mojang.com  is back online. Let's hope it will stay that way… #mcstatus
http://api.mojang.com 终于重新上线。让我们一起希望它会保持下去... #mcstatus





@KrisJelbring
Yeah it works. You just need to add https in front of it :P https://api.mojang.com 
好样的！你应该在网址前面加上https :P https://api.mojang.com
